snippet.title: Red Wings: American Aces | Official Reveal Trailer | Wishlist Now!
snippet.description:
Pilots! A star-spangled spin-off of Red Wings: Aces of the Sky has been announced! Red Wings: American Aces will include multiple online multiplayer game modes for up to 10 players as well as local co-op, PvP, and solo modes and will be available for PC and Nintendo Switch.

Watch the reveal trailer and learn more about the game on its Steam page: https://bit.ly/RedWingsAA_Steam

Red Wings: American Aces puts you in the pilot’s seat of a nostalgic, action-packed arcade shooter illustrated in a vibrant comic-book style with a gaming mode for every occasion. Prove yourself in exciting aerial battles and make a name for your squad as the best aces of WWI! 

Check out Red Wings: American Aces on social media and stay tuned for more news on Red Wings: American Aces:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Redwingsgame/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/RedWingsTheGame/

Check out All in! Games:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/allingamespub​
Twitter: https://twitter.com/allingamespub
Newsletter: https://mailchi.mp/allingames/newsletter
